Name: All Key Test
Description: This course focuses on improving typing speed and accuracy through progressive lessons.

Lessons.PracticeText: This is the introductory material for typing.
Lessons.Description: The course advances to the next level of lessons if the current typing performance level is equal to or above the advanced level.
